entities.description: Reduction in the effect or usage of inhalants over a specified period.
The time frame reference for assessing inhalant use, specifically the last 12 months.
Instances where individuals attempted, but failed, to reduce or stop inhalant use.
The act of using inhalants, evaluated within a specific period.
Desire or wish to reduce or stop inhalant use.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the survey is collecting data on the reduction of inhalant effects.
Indicates that the survey evaluates inhalant use over the past 12 months.
Reports instances where the respondent attempted, but failed, to reduce or stop using inhalants.
Indicates that the survey includes assessments of inhalant use.
Expresses the respondent's wish to reduce or stop inhalant use.
